name: spotify_control
description: Control Spotify playback and manage playlists. Search, play music, create playlists, queue songs, and batch operations. Supports unlimited songs in playlists!

query.description: Search query (for search, play, add_to_playlist, add_to_queue). For multiple tracks, separate with semicolons: 'track1; track2; track3'

songs.description: Semicolon-separated song queries for create_playlist. You can add AS MANY songs as you want! Example: 'bohemian rhapsody; stairway to heaven; hotel california'

limit.description: Limit for search/list results (default: 10 for search, 20 for my_playlists)

operations.description: List of operations for execute_batch. Each operation is an object with 'action' and its required parameters.
